name: Native Demo
description:
Native is currently in development by a single developer, me, and I thought I'd upload this pre-alpha build of the game.

the objective of this demo: to receive feedback and ideas on  where to take the game.

your objective as the player: to kill all the poachers in the level.

you use WASD to move

click shift to run

click control to crouch

click space to dash

right click to aim your bow and left click to fire arrows

you can kill boars and eat the meat to restore health by pressing E

hiding in the grass while a certain distance from the poachers will leave them to search for you in alert mode
